docs.snippet: After many months of tension the Western Hemisphere again is on the high road to united action. The Argentine Government has announced its intention to adhere to the Act of Chapultepec, the charter of American solidarity adopted at Mexico City on...
docs.lead_paragraph: After many months of tension the Western Hemisphere again is on the high road to united action. The Argentine Government has announced its intention to adhere to the Act of Chapultepec, the charter of American solidarity adopted at Mexico City on March 3, and is taking the first important step to give effect to that decision by declaring war on Germany and Japan.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, March 30-- Thirty-seven Governments have formally accepted the invitation to send representatives to the conference of the United Nations on international organization at San Francisco on April 25, the State Department announced today.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, April 6--The United States will support the Dumbarton Oaks proposals as a "basis for discussion" at the United Nations Security Conference in San Francisco, but will reserve the right to offer any amendments to those proposals that it...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 6--The United States will support the Dumbarton Oaks proposals as a "basis for discussion" at the United Nations Security Conference in San Francisco, but will reserve the right to offer any amendments to those proposals that it chooses, Secretary Stettinius asserted today. This country will support the same right for other nations, he said.
